messages.subject: Info on Katana book
messages.msgSnippet: Hey, all, I received a blurb from Amazon about an upcoming book. Here s the link: http://tinyurl.com/37rsy7 They don t seem to have a whole lot of info on what
messages.messageBody:
Hey, all,

I received a blurb from Amazon about an upcoming book. Here's the link:

http://tinyurl.com/37rsy7

They don't seem to have a whole lot of info on what the contents are,
though. It's set to be published in 10 days, but other than a picture
of the cover, I don't have a whole lot to judge if it's worth getting or not.

Thanks in advance!

Best,

Andres
